DOC.brief_summary: This study is being conducted to compare the efficacy of ABT-874 versus Methotrexate in subjects with moderate to severe plaque psoriasis.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Safety and Efficacy Comparing ABT-874 Versus Methotrexate in Subjects With Moderate to Severe Plaque Psoriasis
DOC.detailed_description: This study is only being conducted in the EU and Canada
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of Psoriasis for 6 MO.. BSA 10%, PASI 12 or above, PGA 3 or above Previous exposure to antiIL 12
